Title: Olabimtan most qualified for Ondo APC chairmanship position – Groups
Summary: Ondo Youths in Diaspora (OSYiD) and Social Rehabilitation Group (SRG) have stated that Victor Olabimtan is the most competent and experienced candidate to lead the ONDo State chapter of the APC . The groups said that the Chairman of the State Universal Basic Education (SUB

Title: Alexander-Arnold ‘deserves’ his part in Liverpool title party: Slot
Summary: Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold ‘deserves’ to be part of the title celebrations, says Arne Slot . The England international announced his decision to quit his boyhood club at the start of the season .

Title: EFCC denies Olukoyede’s meeting with unnamed governor
Summary: Paul Ibe, spokesperson to former Vice President Atiku Abubakar, said Ola Olukoyede held a secret meeting with an unnamed governor . The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) has denied the claims . The anti-graft agency said it is outraged by the ‘unfounded claims’

Title: Departing Ancelotti wishes Alonso luck as his Real Madrid successor
Summary: Carlo Ancelotti wishes Xabi Alonso 'all the luck in the world' before taking charge of his final game at Real Madrid . Bayer Leverkusen coach Alonso is set to take over from Carlo Ancellotti .

Title: Chelsea can cope with pressure of top-five battle, says Maresca
Summary: Enzo Maresca has backed Chelsea to handle the pressure of their do-or-die showdown with Nottingham Forest . The race for Champions League places reaches a dramatic climax on Sunday . Chelsea head to the City Ground knowing a victory over Forest would be crucial .

Title: Judge temporarily halts Trump block on foreign students at Harvard
Summary: Judge temporarily halts Trump block on foreign students at Harvard . Loss of foreign nationals could prove costly to Harvard, which charges tens of thousands of dollars a year in tuition .

Title: Kaduna woman in police net for killing co-wife’s child
Summary: Zaliha Shuaibu arrested for alleged infanticide of her co-wife's three-month-old baby boy . The Kaduna State Police Command has arrested one of the women .

Title: PDP crisis: Saraki-led reconciliation committee members visit gov Mbah
Summary: Saraki-led reconciliation committee members visit Mbah . They are members of the PDP Reconciliation and Strategy Committee . The committee was set up by PDP Governor’s Forum .

Title: Trump fires new 50% tariff threat at EU, drawing stiff response
Summary: Trump fires new 50% tariff threat at EU, drawing stiff response . European leaders and senior politicians reacted with dismay to Trump's announcement, and called for de-escalation .

Title: US beefs up security after murder of Israeli embassy staff
Summary: US beefs up security after murder of Israeli embassy staff . Authorities in Washington said they were investigating the shooting "as an act of terrorism and as a hate crime".

Title: Djokovic nears 100th ATP title, reaches Geneva final
Summary: Novak Djokovic reaches final of clay-court event in Geneva to reach 100th ATP title . Serbian missed a match point in the second set before eventually winning 6-4, 6-7 (6/8), 6-1 . The 24-time Grand Slam champion is playing in Switzerland to warm up for the French Open

Title: ‎NDLEA, US-DEA to strengthen collaboration on drug war
Summary: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency and the Drug Enforcement Administration of the United States stressed the need to strengthen current collaboration between the two agencies in the fight against substance abuse and illicit drug trafficking . Title: Rector hails Tinubu, Yayi over Ilaro Poly upgrade to varsity
Summary: The Rector of Federal Polytechnic, Ilaro, Ogun State, Mukail Akinde, has applauded President Bola Tinubu for his committed interest in reviving the hope of Nigerians . Title: Saraki-led PDP reconciliation team begins consultation, meets Enugu gov
Summary: The Special Reconciliation Committee of the Peoples Democratic Party met with Governor Peter Mbah of Enugu State and leader of the party in the South East in a desperate efforts to stem the tide of crisis rocking the party . Title: Court jails man six months for defacing naira in Lagos
Summary: A man identified as Okoli Emeka has been sentenced to six months’ imprisonment for defacing Naira notes during an event held in Isheri-Olofin, within the Alimosho area of Lagos .
